mapper.delete: DELETE FROM agile_version_issue_rel WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 0 FROM agile_issue ai left join agile_issue_status ais on ai.status_id = ais.status_id and ai.project_id = ais.project_id WHERE agile_version_issue_rel.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND ais.is_completed != 1 ) AND agile_version_issue_rel.relation_type = 'fix' and agile_version_issue_rel.version_id = #{versionId} AND agile_version_issue_rel.project_id = #{projectId}

DELETE FROM agile_version_issue_rel WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND version_id IN
#{versionId}
mapper.select: SELECT avir.version_id from agile_version_issue_rel avir ,agile_product_version apv where apv.version_id = avir.version_id and apv.status_code != 'archived' and avir.project_id = #{projectId} and avir.issue_id = #{issueId}
